content: can I use the fhir model with asp.net core serialization?, when i try it attempts to model bind but i get alot of "Could not create an instance of type Hl7.Fhir.Model.Resource. Type is an interface or abstract class and cannot be instantiated. Path.." do i have to use the .parse() that is provided?
disregard i found an earlier post that answered my question ....default serializer doesn't work with fhir model :(
